etymologies: late 18th century: via French and German from Swedish desman-råtta ‘muskrat’, from desman ‘musk’

definitions: a small semiaquatic European mammal related to the mole, with a long tubular muzzle and webbed toes.

notes.text: Family Talpidae: the Russian desman (Desmana moschata) and the Pyrenean desman (Galemys pyrenaicus)

shortDefinitions: small semiaquatic European mammal related to mole
